scripts.compile-native: mkdir -p artifacts-task/native && cd artifacts-task/native && g++ ../../reverse.cpp -o reverse
scripts.compile-wasm: mkdir -p artifacts-task/wasm && cd artifacts-task/wasm && emcc -s WASM=1 ../../reverse.cpp -o reverse.js
scripts.compile-truebit: mkdir -p artifacts-task/truebit artifacts-task/wasm-truebit && cd artifacts-task && node /truebit-eth/emscripten-module-wrapper/prepare.js wasm/reverse.js --out wasm-truebit --asmjs > truebit/reverse.wasm.json && cp wasm-truebit/globals.wasm truebit/reverse.wasm
scripts.compile: npm run compile-wasm && npm run compile-truebit && npm run compile-contracts
